S.FORM: djavadjavai a masantalj. patagilj anga.
djavadjavai a masantalj. patagilj anga.
qacalji! i cungali.
qacalji! i congali.
djavadajvai sinsi.
djavadajvai sinsi.
kana venalai sinsi
kana venalai sinsi
qiladji.
qiladji.
qiladju.
qiladjo.
djavadjavai a masantalj.uri temulu a ken a nu sinsi tua patjara kakanen, sa anemaya a penayuanan?
djavadjavai a masantalj.ori temolo a ken a no sinsi toa patjara kakanen, sa anemaya a penayoanan?
S.TRANSL: 大家好。今天老師要教大家食物的排灣語怎麼說。
Hello everyone. Today I am going to teach you how to say Paiwanese for food.

S.FORM: pulingalingaw sun tua ku sinitulu?
polingalingaw son toa ko sinitolo?
S.TRANSL: Do you understand what the teacher says?

S.FORM: kemeljang sun tua anemayamaya ken a su sinsi?
kemeljang son toa anemayamaya ken a so sinsi?
S.TRANSL: Do you understand what the teacher says?

S.FORM: sinsi, ini aken a pulingalingaw. pai qaqivuanan a puita.
sinsi, ini aken a polingalingaw. pai qaqivoanan a poita.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我不懂。可以再說一次嗎?
I don’t understand. Can you repeat it again?

S.FORM: ini a ken a lemadenga, pai tja pasiqacauana?
ini a ken a lemadenga, pai tja pasiqacaoana?
S.TRANSL: 我聽不到，可以大聲一點嗎?
I can’t hear you, can you speak louder?

S.FORM: pacunu a pasamaza! kicuali a ken a semupu a puita.
pacono a pasamaza! kicoali a ken a semopo a poita.
S.TRANSL: 請看這裡! 跟著我唸一遍。
Look here, please! Repeat after me.

S.FORM: nanguaq aravac a tja sinupuan.
nangoaq aravac a tja sinopoan.
pai kituluanan a puitanga. tja pasiqacau ananri.
pai kitoloanan a poitanga. tja pasiqacao ananri.
S.TRANSL: Read it again. Please speak louder.

S.FORM: maliceng. maya kiljavadran.
maliceng. maya kiljavadran.
kalicengu, maya qivu.
kalicengo, maya qivo.
pai alapu a nu laqulj.
pai alapo a no laqolj.
ui, sinsi.
oi, sinsi.
pai alapu a nu inepic.
pai alapo a no inepic.
sinsi, madraudrav a ken a kemacu tua ku inepic.
sinsi, madraodrav a ken a kemaco toa ko inepic.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: sinsi, ini a ken a paqenetj a kemacu tua ku inepic.
sinsi, ini a ken a paqenetj a kemaco toa ko inepic.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: pai alapu a nu siquliqulip.
pai alapo a no siqoliqolip.
sinsi, madraudrav a ken a kemacu tua ku siquliqulip.
sinsi, madraodrav a ken a kemaco toa ko siqoliqolip.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my eraser.

S.FORM: sinsi, ini a ken a paqenetj a kemacu tua ku siquliqulip.
sinsi, ini a ken a paqenetj a kemaco toa ko siqoliqolip.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my eraser.

S.FORM: pai kisedjamu tua su sapitjan tua siquliqulip.
pai kisedjamo toa so sapitjan toa siqoliqolip.
S.TRANSL: 請跟旁邊同學借橡皮擦。
Please borrow erasers from your classmates.

S.FORM: pasedjami a ken tua su siquliqulip ui?
pasedjami a ken toa so siqoliqolip oi?
semu-a anga men tua nia kitulu.
semo-a anga men toa nia kitolo.
qemacuvung anga men tua kitulu.
qemacovong anga men toa kitolo.
djalju mazai tua tja kitulu, cevucevungi anga nu tjaivililj tua pulavai.
djaljo mazai toa tja kitolo, cevocevongi anga no tjaivililj toa polavai.
S.TRANSL: 我們就上到這邊，下週再見。
Class dismissed, see you next week.

S.FORM: tima sun?
tima son?
ti Qipu a ken.
ti Qipo a ken.
tima sun?
tima son?
aljak a ken ni Sedjam, ti Qipu a ken.
aljak a ken ni Sedjam, ti Qipo a ken.
S.TRANSL: I am Sedjam's son and my name is Qipu.

S.FORM: tima sun?
tima son?
vencik a ken ni sinsi i Puljaljuyan, ti Qipu a ken.
vencik a ken ni sinsi i Poljaljoyan, ti Qipo a ken.
S.TRANSL: I am a student of Puljaljuyan and my name is Qipu.

S.FORM: tima su ngadan?
tima so ngadan?
a ku ngadan ti Qipu.
a ko ngadan ti Qipo.
tima ngadan ni tjama?
tima ngadan ni tjama?
pinaka tima ti tjama?
pinaka tima ti tjama?
a ngadan ni kama pinaka ti Sedjam.
a ngadan ni kama pinaka ti Sedjam.
a ku kama ti Sedjam.
a ko kama ti Sedjam.
tima timadju?
tima timadjo?
ti Bua timadju.
ti Boa timadjo.
u kaka a uqaljai a tjavulung tjanuaken timadju, ti Bua timadju.
o kaka a oqaljai a tjavolong tjanoaken timadjo, ti Boa timadjo.
S.TRANSL: He's my brother, his name is Bua.

S.FORM: tima ngadan nimadju?
tima ngadan nimadjo?
ti Gese timadju
ti Gese timadjo
ti Gese a ngadan nimadju?
ti Gese a ngadan nimadjo?
pinaka ti Gese timadju?
pinaka ti Gese timadjo?
ui, pinaka ti Gese timadju.
oi, pinaka ti Gese timadjo.
ti Apung a ngadan nimadju?
ti Apong a ngadan nimadjo?
ini, a ngadan nimadju ti Apang.
ini, a ngadan nimadjo ti Apang.
tima azua?
tima azoa?
ti Aljui timadju. ku kina ti kinai Aljui timadju.
ti Aljoi timadjo. ko kina ti kinai Aljoi timadjo.
tima azua?
tima azoa?
ku drava timadju, ti Ipi a ngadan nimadju.
ko drava timadjo, ti Ipi a ngadan nimadjo.
S.TRANSL: 她是我的朋友，她的名字是Ipi。
She's a friend of mine, her name is Ipi.

S.FORM: pidanga a su cavilj tucu?
pidanga a so cavilj toco?
tapuluq anga ku cavilj tucu.
tapoloq anga ko cavilj toco.
pidanga a cavilj nimadju tucu?
pidanga a cavilj nimadjo toco?
tapuluq saka drusa a cavilj nimadju tucu.
tapoloq saka drosa a cavilj nimadjo toco.
pidanga a cavilj ni tjama tucu?
pidanga a cavilj ni tjama toco?
limapluq anga a cavilj na ku kama tucu.
limaploq anga a cavilj na ko kama toco.
mapida a su siruvetjek?
mapida a so sirovetjek?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: mapida mun a mare kakakaka?
mapida mon a mare kakakaka?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: izua madrusa a tjavulung tja nu aken a ku kaka a uqaljai katua vavayan, sa macidilj a tjaljaljak tja nu aken ku kaka a vavayan.
izoa madrosa a tjavolong tja no aken a ko kaka a oqaljai katoa vavayan, sa macidilj a tjaljaljak tja no aken ko kaka a vavayan.
S.TRANSL: 我有兩個兄姐，一個弟妹。
I have two brothers and sisters and one younger brother and sister.

S.FORM: izua a su kaka a tjavulung tjanusun a uqaljai?
izoa a so kaka a tjavolong tjanoson a oqaljai?
neka nu ku kaka a tjavulung tjanuaen a uqaljai.
neka no ko kaka a tjavolong tjanoaen a oqaljai.
malje pida mun a tacemekeljan?
malje pida mon a tacemekeljan?
S.TRANSL: How many people are in your family?

S.FORM: izua men a ma sepatj a tacemekeljan.
izoa men a ma sepatj a tacemekeljan.
S.TRANSL: There are four of us in our family.

S.FORM: i tulutulu sun i zainu?
i tolotolo son i zaino?
i tulutulu a ken i Taihuku.
i tolotolo a ken i Taihoko.
tima timadju?
tima timadjo?
ku kama timadju a siruvetjek ni kama.
ko kama timadjo a sirovetjek ni kama.
anema a kipusengesengesenganan ni tjama a siruvetjek ni tjaina?
anema a kiposengesengesenganan ni tjama a sirovetjek ni tjaina?
S.TRANSL: 你的舅舅從事什麼工作?
What does your uncle do for a living?

S.FORM: kisacu timadju.
kisaco timadjo.
tima azua?
tima azoa?
ku kaka a vavayan a tjavulung tjanuaken timadju.
ko kaka a vavayan a tjavolong tjanoaken timadjo.
izua sengesengan ni su kaka a vavayan?
izoa sengesengan ni so kaka a vavayan?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister have a job?

S.FORM: kipusengesengesengan timadju i biyuing.
kiposengesengesengan timadjo i biyoing.
mare suruvetjek tiamadju?
mare sorovetjek tiamadjo?
S.TRANSL: 他們兩個人是兄弟姐妹嗎?

S.FORM: ini, mare qali tiamadju.
ini, mare qali tiamadjo.
paiyuan sun?
paiyoan son?
kacalisiyan sun?
kacalisiyan son?
ui, paiyuan a ken.
oi, paiyoan a ken.
paiyuan a su cekelj?
paiyoan a so cekelj?
ui, ljakua se Bunun zuku timadju.
oi, ljakoa se Bonon zoko timadjo.
qacaqaca ti tjama?
qacaqaca ti tjama?
ui, qaqacaqacan amen a tacemekeljan.
oi, qaqacaqacan amen a tacemekeljan.
S.TRANSL: Yes, we are all very tall.

S.FORM: ma gakkuku anga su kaka a vavayan a tjaljaljak tjanusun?
ma gakkoko anga so kaka a vavayan a tjaljaljak tjanoson?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister go to school?

S.FORM: ui, ma gakkuku anga timadju.
oi, ma gakkoko anga timadjo.
saiqu a penaiyuana a su kaka a tjaljaljak tjanusun?
saiqo a penaiyoana a so kaka a tjaljaljak tjanoson?
S.TRANSL: Do your siblings speak the language?

S.FORM: ui, saigu tiamadju a penaiyuanan.
oi, saigo tiamadjo a penaiyoanan.
S.TRANSL: Yes, they speak the ethnic language.

S.FORM: mapida a su siruvetjek?
mapida a so sirovetjek?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: izua ma tjelu a ku siruvetjek.
izoa ma tjelo a ko sirovetjek.
S.TRANSL: I have three brothers and sisters.

S.FORM: na matevelj a su kama katua su kina tua umaq?
na matevelj a so kama katoa so kina toa omaq?
S.TRANSL: 你和爸爸媽媽一起住嗎?
Do you live with your parents?

S.FORM: ui, namatevelj a ku kama atua ku kina.
oi, namatevelj a ko kama atoa ko kina.
S.TRANSL: 是，我和爸爸媽媽一起住。
Yes, I live with my mom and dad.

S.FORM: na kiatevelj sun tua su vuvu a uqaljai katua vavayan?
na kiatevelj son toa so vovo a oqaljai katoa vavayan?
S.TRANSL: 你和爺爺奶奶一起住嗎?
Do you live with your grandparents?

S.FORM: ini, ini a ken a nakitatevelj tjayamadju.
ini, ini a ken a nakitatevelj tjayamadjo.
S.TRANSL: 不，我沒和跟他們一起住。
No, I didn’t live with them.

S.FORM: tima su kiniteveljan?
tima so kiniteveljan?
na kitatevelj a ken tjai kama, tjai kina, ktua ku kaka a tjavulung tjanuaken a uqaljai.
na kitatevelj a ken tjai kama, tjai kina, ktoa ko kaka a tjavolong tjanoaken a oqaljai.
S.TRANSL: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥住在一起。
I live with my father, mother and brother.

S.FORM: na kemasinu sun?
na kemasino son?
na kemasi Akaw a ken.
na kemasi Akaw a ken.
inuan a nu umaq?
inoan a no omaq?
a nia umaq i Akaw.
a nia omaq i Akaw.
inuan a su qinaljan?
inoan a so qinaljan?
i Akaw a ku qinaljan.
i Akaw a ko qinaljan.
inuan a su qinaljan?
inoan a so qinaljan?
i Akaw a ku qinaljan.
i Akaw a ko qinaljan.
tuki nungidanga a su sisaumaqan?
toki nongidanga a so sisaomaqan?
S.TRANSL: 你什麼時候會回去部落?
When are you going back to the tribe?

S.FORM: nu kaljapulavayan tua zulezulan maumaq aken sakamaya.
no kaljapolavayan toa zolezolan maomaq aken sakamaya.
S.TRANSL: I will go back in the summer.

S.FORM: aljak aken na kacalisiyan.
aljak aken na kacalisiyan.
namakuda a qadaw tucu?
namakoda a qadaw toco?
qadavan anga, zemulezul aravac.
qadavan anga, zemolezol aravac.
S.TRANSL: The sun is coming out, it's very hot.

S.FORM: ljemaljeqljeqel a icasaw?
ljemaljeqljeqel a icasaw?
S.TRANSL: Is it going to be cold outside?

S.FORM: ljamaljeqel aravac, sa itungu a pakaliyaw.
ljamaljeqel aravac, sa itongo a pakaliyaw.
S.TRANSL: It's cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: zemulezulezul a icasaw?
zemolezolezol a icasaw?
ini, venalivali anga, sarenguanguaq aravac.
ini, venalivali anga, sarengoangoaq aravac.
namakuda a kinaqadavan tucu?
namakoda a kinaqadavan toco?
inika ljaljeqeleqel inika zemulezulezul, sarenguaq a racac.
inika ljaljeqeleqel inika zemolezolezol, sarengoaq a racac.
S.TRANSL: 今天不冷也不熱，很舒服。
It's neither cold nor hot today, very comfortable.

S.FORM: namakuda sa kinavenginan tucu?
namakoda sa kinavenginan toco?
neka nu qerepus, mapacucun anga a vitjuqan.
neka no qerepos, mapacocon anga a vitjoqan.
S.TRANSL: 天空沒有雲，星星出來了。
There were no clouds in the sky; the stars came out.

S.FORM: namakuda a kinaqadavan nua i casaw?
namakoda a kinaqadavan noa i casaw?
tjaumeljai, maqadaw anga, sa tjevuta anga a quljivangaraw.
tjaomeljai, maqadaw anga, sa tjevota anga a qoljivangaraw.
S.TRANSL: 雨剛剛停，出了太陽，彩虹出來了。
The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.

S.FORM: tjau maka qudjalj, sa maqadaw anga, sa puquljivangaraw anga.
tjao maka qodjalj, sa maqadaw anga, sa poqoljivangaraw anga.
S.TRANSL: 雨剛剛停，出了太陽，彩虹出來了。
The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.

S.FORM: namakuda a kinaqadaqadavan i tjanumun?
namakoda a kinaqadaqadavan i tjanomon?
S.TRANSL: What's the weather like where you are?

S.FORM: venalivali aravac imaza i tjanuamen.
venalivali aravac imaza i tjanoamen.
S.TRANSL: We're going to have a big storm here.

S.FORM: namaljenguaq a kinaqadavan i tjanumun?
namaljengoaq a kinaqadavan i tjanomon?
nanguaq aravac, maqadaqadaw.
nangoaq aravac, maqadaqadaw.
S.TRANSL: Very well, out of the big sun.

S.FORM: uri vaik anga ken a kitulu.
ori vaik anga ken a kitolo.
S.TRANSL: I have to go to school.

S.FORM: ljemaljeqel aravac, sa itungu a pakaliyaw.
ljemaljeqel aravac, sa itongo a pakaliyaw.
S.TRANSL: The weather is very cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: uri casaw anga ken.
ori casaw anga ken.
ki qemudjalj a paljaqaca nu sauni, paqenetju a masi ljaung.
ki qemodjalj a paljaqaca no saoni, paqenetjo a masi ljaong.
S.TRANSL: 等一下會下大雨，你要記得帶傘。
It's going to rain heavily, you have to remember to bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: uri qemudjalj?
ori qemodjalj?
cemlalalalaq anga, ki qemudjalj nu sauni.
cemlalalalaq anga, ki qemodjalj no saoni.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛打雷了，等一下應該就會下雨。
There was thunder just now, and it's supposed to rain later.

S.FORM: qemudjaqudjalj anga?
qemodjaqodjalj anga?
na qemudjalj ta sauni, sa meljai anga tucu.
na qemodjalj ta saoni, sa meljai anga toco.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛有下雨，現在雨停了。
It just rained, and now it's stopped.

S.FORM: qemudjaqudjalj anga?
qemodjaqodjalj anga?
matu na qemudjalj anga, tjevetjeveng a djalan.
mato na qemodjalj anga, tjevetjeveng a djalan.
S.TRANSL: 好像下過雨了，馬路是濕的。
It seems to have rained and the road is wet.

S.FORM: na qemudjalj? Aqu sun a tjevetjeveng a penulingelingetj?
na qemodjalj? Aqo son a tjevetjeveng a penolingelingetj?
S.TRANSL: 有下雨嗎?你怎麼全身都濕了?
Is it raining? Why are you all wet?

S.FORM: qemudjaqudjalj a i casaw, ini aken a namasi ljaung.
qemodjaqodjalj a i casaw, ini aken a namasi ljaong.
S.TRANSL: 外面在下雨，我沒有帶雨傘。
It's raining outside, so I didn't bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: namakudanga sun?
namakodanga son?
kemudakudanga sun?
kemodakodanga son?
paljaqaca aravac sa vali, lemutud a ku qulu tua ku kinipavalian.
paljaqaca aravac sa vali, lemotod a ko qolo toa ko kinipavalian.
S.TRANSL: The wind is blowing so hard that my head hurts.

S.FORM: namakudanga sun?
namakodanga son?
maqadaw aravac, vucengel a ku qulu tua ku kinipaqadavan.
maqadaw aravac, vocengel a ko qolo toa ko kinipaqadavan.
S.TRANSL: 太陽好大，曬得我頭好暈。
The sun is so big, it makes me dizzy.

S.FORM: dremaudraw anga ken a kemacu tua inepic.
dremaodraw anga ken a kemaco toa inepic.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: malim anga ken a kemacu tua inepic.
malim anga ken a kemaco toa inepic.
ku pasedjamai sun.
ko pasedjamai son.
dremaudraw anga ken a kemacu tua qecap.
dremaodraw anga ken a kemaco toa qecap.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my chopsticks.

S.FORM: malim anga ken a kemacu tua qecap.
malim anga ken a kemaco toa qecap.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my chopsticks.

S.FORM: ini aken uta a nakemacu, ari veli-i.
ini aken ota a nakemaco, ari veli-i.
S.TRANSL: I don't have one either, let's go buy one.

S.FORM: ari veli-i tua inepic ui?
ari veli-i toa inepic oi?
S.TRANSL: Let's go buy a pen, shall we?

S.FORM: vaiki a veneli tua inepic ui?
vaiki a veneli toa inepic oi?
S.TRANSL: Let's go buy a pen, shall we?

S.FORM: nanguaq, sa uri veneli anan aken tua siquliqulip.
nangoaq, sa ori veneli anan aken toa siqoliqolip.
S.TRANSL: Well, I still have to buy erasers.

S.FORM: ui, sa uri veneli aken uta tua siquliqulip.
oi, sa ori veneli aken ota toa siqoliqolip.
S.TRANSL: Well, I still have to buy erasers.

S.FORM: ari veli-i tua tja kenamain ui?
ari veli-i toa tja kenamain oi?
S.TRANSL: Let's go get breakfast, shall we?

S.FORM: tjuari, na kenama anga ken i tjumaq.
tjoari, na kenama anga ken i tjomaq.
S.TRANSL: No, I've already eaten at home.

S.FORM: dremaudraw anga ken a semeljec tua bintu.
dremaodraw anga ken a semeljec toa binto.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to steam my lunchbox.

S.FORM: malim anga ken a semeljec tua bintu.
malim anga ken a semeljec toa binto.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to steam my lunchbox.

S.FORM: sau seljecu a kirimu.
sao seljeco a kirimo.
vaiku a semeljec a kirimu.
vaiko a semeljec a kirimo.
dremaudraw anga ken a kemacu tua bintu.
dremaodraw anga ken a kemaco toa binto.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my lunchbox.

S.FORM: malim anga ken a kemacuc tua bintu.
malim anga ken a kemacoc toa binto.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my lunchbox.

S.FORM: pai tja kanaw a ku bintu numaya.
pai tja kanaw a ko binto nomaya.
S.TRANSL: 那我們一起吃我的便當吧!
Then let's eat my lunch box together!

S.FORM: anema uri su cengelj?
anema ori so cengelj?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: uri anema a su kinecengeljen?
ori anema a so kinecengeljen?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: uri keman aken tua sinancengelj nua gakku.
ori keman aken toa sinancengelj noa gakko.
S.TRANSL: 我要吃學校的營養午餐。
I want a nutritious school lunch.

S.FORM: anema uri su cengelj?
anema ori so cengelj?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: uri keman su tua nema tua cengelj?
ori keman so toa nema toa cengelj?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: nakemasi cenglj a ken tua bintu tucu, pai kaljingulji a kincengelj!
nakemasi cenglj a ken toa binto toco, pai kaljingolji a kincengelj!
S.TRANSL: 我今天有帶便當，我們中午一起吃吧!

I don’t know much about it, but I will try to answer as best I can.

S.FORM: djavadjavai aki makaya ken a paiga tjanusun? ulja sika tjasaceqalja a pu sivecik nu tjaivililj.
djavadjavai aki makaya ken a paiga tjanoson? olja sika tjasaceqalja a po sivecik no tjaivililj.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄影嗎？這樣以後比較容易記錄。
Can I record the video? It will be easier to record in the future.

S.FORM: ui, inika makuda.
oi, inika makoda.
pai pidanga su cavilj tucu?
pai pidanga so cavilj toco?
izuanga a sivapuljuq saka alu anga ku cavilj tucu.
izoanga a sivapoljoq saka alo anga ko cavilj toco.
kakedrian anan sun.
kakedrian anan son.
kedri anan a su cavilj.
kedri anan a so cavilj.
ini anemanai, ramaljeng anga ken aravac.
ini anemanai, ramaljeng anga ken aravac.
na kemasinu sun?
na kemasino son?
na kemasi Pucunug aken.
na kemasi Poconog aken.
se payuan a su cekelj uta?
se payoan a so cekelj ota?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的太太也是排灣族人嗎？
Is your wife also a Paiwan?

S.FORM: ini, se Amais timadju.
ini, se Amais timadjo.
masan pidalj a kai a su kinasaigu a qivu?
masan pidalj a kai a so kinasaigo a qivo?
saigu a ken a penayuanan katua kai nia se Amis.
saigo a ken a penayoanan katoa kai nia se Amis.
S.TRANSL: 我會說排灣語和阿美語。

S.FORM: namasi levan a ken a kisusu tjanusun tucu, pai qaqivu, nanguaq sun a pasemalaw tua patjara sinan palisi tua patjanu qemaljup ui?
namasi levan a ken a kisoso tjanoson toco, pai qaqivo, nangoaq son a pasemalaw toa patjara sinan palisi toa patjano qemaljop oi?
S.TRANSL: 今天很高興能訪問您，請您談一下，有關狩獵的禁忌好嗎？
It’s a pleasure to interview you today, can you talk about the taboo of hunting?

S.FORM: ui nanguaq. Ka maqacuvucuvung anan a ken vaivaik a ken a murisacemel a sema vukid.
oi nangoaq. Ka maqacovocovong anan a ken vaivaik a ken a morisacemel a sema vokid.
S.TRANSL: 好的。我年輕的時候很常到山林打獵。
Yes. I used to go hunting in the mountains when I was young.

S.FORM: pinakalevan, nanguaq aravac a su sinitulu tucu.
pinakalevan, nangoaq aravac a so sinitolo toco.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝，您今天所教導的真是太棒了。
Thank you, what you taught me today was really great.

S.FORM: namasan paqulid angata a ku siniqaqivu, mana sinitjaucikel nua mareka tja vuvu.
namasan paqolid angata a ko siniqaqivo, mana sinitjaocikel noa mareka tja vovo.
S.TRANSL: 我所説的都是千真萬確的，祖先所流傳的講述。
All that I say is true, the sayings of my ancestors.

S.FORM: uri tja tjaljumaza anga a tja kaljavar. pinakalevan aravac a su sinitjaucikel.
ori tja tjaljomaza anga a tja kaljavar. pinakalevan aravac a so sinitjaocikel.
S.TRANSL: 今天的訪談就到這邊。非常謝謝您的分享。
That’s all for today’s interview. Thank you very much for sharing with us.

S.FORM: inika makuda, tja cusuaw anga nu tjaivililj.
inika makoda, tja cosoaw anga no tjaivililj.
uri vaik anga ken, ulja tjaliyaw anan a ku ki tjaucikelen nu tjaivililj.
ori vaik anga ken, olja tjaliyaw anan a ko ki tjaocikelen no tjaivililj.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，期待下次聽到更多的故事。
I’m going to leave now and look forward to hearing more stories next time.

S.FORM: nanguaq! Galju anga.
nangoaq! Galjo anga.
navenala sun, anema su velin?
navenala son, anema so velin?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what do you want to buy?

S.FORM: uri venli aken tua kuppu tu ita.
ori venli aken toa koppo to ita.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a cup.

S.FORM: navenala sun, anema su velin?
navenala son, anema so velin?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what do you want to buy?

S.FORM: uri venli aken tua tjalupung tu ita.
ori venli aken toa tjalopong to ita.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a hat.

S.FORM: uri venli aken tua kuppu, izua nu sipaveliveli?
ori venli aken toa koppo, izoa no sipaveliveli?
S.TRANSL: 我要買杯子，你們有賣嗎？
I want to buy a cup, do you sell them?

S.FORM: izua, uri pida su velin?
izoa, ori pida so velin?
S.TRANSL: Yes, how many do you want to buy?

S.FORM: paveliveli mun tua saviki?
paveliveli mon toa saviki?
neka, inika men a paveliveli tua saviki.
neka, inika men a paveliveli toa saviki.
S.TRANSL: No, we don't sell betel nut.

S.FORM: venli a ken tua padai.
venli a ken toa padai.
uri tjanu pida a su velin?
ori tjano pida a so velin?
S.TRANSL: How many packs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: pavai a ken tu tjanu tjelu a cavu.
pavai a ken to tjano tjelo a cavo.
uri veneli a ken tua vurati.
ori veneli a ken toa vorati.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: mapulat anga a velin a vurati.
mapolat anga a velin a vorati.
S.TRANSL: All the sweet potatoes are sold out.

S.FORM: uri venli a ken tua tjanu drusa a qalew.
ori venli a ken toa tjano drosa a qalew.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two bottles of oil.

S.FORM: tjanu ita anga imaza tjanuamen.
tjano ita anga imaza tjanoamen.
S.TRANSL: We only have one bottle left.

S.FORM: sau velian a ken tua qacilu.
sao velian a ken toa qacilo.
pida tjingtjingan a su velin?
pida tjingtjingan a so velin?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds do you want to buy?

S.FORM: pida nu tjingtjingan a qacilu tua su velin?
pida no tjingtjingan a qacilo toa so velin?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds of eggs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: uri drusa tjingtjingan a ku velin.
ori drosa tjingtjingan a ko velin.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two catties.

S.FORM: veneli a ken tua drusa djaljengan a kucai.
veneli a ken toa drosa djaljengan a kocai.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two green onions.

S.FORM: tjelu anga nu djaljengan imaza, nisun anga penuljat.
tjelo anga no djaljengan imaza, nison anga penoljat.
S.TRANSL: There are three left, all for you!

S.FORM: pida cu a padai?
pida co a padai?
S.TRANSL: How much is this bag of rice?

S.FORM: drusai dai a tacavu.
drosai dai a tacavo.
drusapuluq saka tavatan a penuljat, sa pumaya i drusanga puluq.
drosapoloq saka tavatan a penoljat, sa pomaya i drosanga poloq.
pinakalevan.
pinakalevan.
siva puluq saka lima vatan a imaza.
siva poloq saka lima vatan a imaza.
veneli anan a ken tu kedri, ulja madjaljun a taitai.
veneli anan a ken to kedri, olja madjaljon a taitai.
S.TRANSL: I'll buy some more, and make up 100 yuan.

S.FORM: limai dai saka tapuluq a penuljat.
limai dai saka tapoloq a penoljat.
pai ulja limai dai anga a ku sivai ui?
pai olja limai dai anga a ko sivai oi?
pazangal cu aravac, makaya a papemadjuluin?
pazangal co aravac, makaya a papemadjoloin?
S.TRANSL: 這個太貴了，可以算便宜一點嗎？
It's too expensive, can you make it cheaper?

S.FORM: inika maqati, pinaka madjulu angaravac aicu
inika maqati, pinaka madjolo angaravac aico
S.TRANSL: 不行，這個已經很便宜了。
No, this is already very cheap.

S.FORM: uri ku alapen cu a piyapiya.
ori ko alapen co a piyapiya.
S.TRANSL: I want this packet of cookies.

S.FORM: tjelu a pulu cu a piyapiya, sa izuanan a su kinasalinga?
tjelo a polo co a piyapiya, sa izoanan a so kinasalinga?
S.TRANSL: 這餅乾30元，還需要別的東西嗎？
$30 for the cookies, anything else you need?

S.FORM: makaya ken a kisedjam tua su paisu?
makaya ken a kisedjam toa so paiso?
S.TRANSL: Can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: ui makaya! makudakuda a su kisedjamen?
oi makaya! makodakoda a so kisedjamen?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How much do you need?

S.FORM: maljim anga ken a masipaisu, makaya ken a kisedjam tua su paisu?
maljim anga ken a masipaiso, makaya ken a kisedjam toa so paiso?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎？
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: ini a ken a namasi paisu auta!
ini a ken a namasi paiso aota!
S.TRANSL: I don't have any money either!

S.FORM: dremaudrav anga ken a kemasi paisu, maqati a ken a kisedjam tua su paisu?
dremaodrav anga ken a kemasi paiso, maqati a ken a kisedjam toa so paiso?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎？
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: ini a maqati, a su kinisedjam ka sitjaisangas a paisu inikanan a su valiti a ken.
ini a maqati, a so kinisedjam ka sitjaisangas a paiso inikanan a so valiti a ken.
S.TRANSL: 不要，上次借的錢你都還沒還我。
No, you haven't paid me back the money you borrowed last time.

S.FORM: makaya a ken a kisedjam tua su itung?
makaya a ken a kisedjam toa so itong?
makaya, sau alapu tisun a macidilj.
makaya, sao alapo tison a macidilj.
makaya a ken a kisedjam tua su laqulj?
makaya a ken a kisedjam toa so laqolj?
ku sinipasedjam anga tjai Vais.
ko sinipasedjam anga tjai Vais.
pasedjaman tjanuaken a su tjukutjuku ui?
pasedjaman tjanoaken a so tjokotjoko oi?
S.TRANSL: 請借給我你的腳踏車好嗎?
Can I borrow your bicycle, please?

S.FORM: ui nanguaq, ljakua pacikelu anga nu tiyaw tjanuaken.
oi nangoaq, ljakoa pacikelo anga no tiyaw tjanoaken.
S.TRANSL: Okay, but you have to give it back to me tomorrow.

S.FORM: qemudjalj anga, ini aken a namasi kausua, pasedjami a ken tua kusua ui?
qemodjalj anga, ini aken a namasi kaosoa, pasedjami a ken toa kosoa oi?
S.TRANSL: 下雨了，我沒有帶傘，借我傘好嗎？
It's raining, I don't have an umbrella, can you lend me one?

S.FORM: ita a kausua a ku kinacu, tja kiljaljaungai!
ita a kaosoa a ko kinaco, tja kiljaljaongai!
S.TRANSL: 我只有一把傘，我們一起撐吧！
I only have an umbrella, let's stick together!

S.FORM: aicu a su sinipasedjam ka tjaisangas a ljaqulj tjanuaken, ku pacikelaw tjanusun.
aico a so sinipasedjam ka tjaisangas a ljaqolj tjanoaken, ko pacikelaw tjanoson.
S.TRANSL: 這是你上次借我的書，還給你。
This is the book you borrowed from me last time, I give it back to you.

S.FORM: sa pacun anan sun tua anema nu ljaquljan makaya ken a su pasemalavan.
sa pacon anan son toa anema no ljaqoljan makaya ken a so pasemalavan.
S.TRANSL: 還想看什麼書都可以跟我說。
You can tell me what else you want to read.

S.FORM: ki nungida ken a venalid tua su paisu?
ki nongida ken a venalid toa so paiso?
S.TRANSL: When do I have to pay you back?

S.FORM: inika makuda, valitu anga nu izuanga su paisu.
inika makoda, valito anga no izoanga so paiso.
S.TRANSL: 沒關係，你有錢的時候再說。
It doesn't matter, you can talk about it when you have money.

S.FORM: nungida anga sun a semu kiyam tua ku paisu?
nongida anga son a semo kiyam toa ko paiso?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to pay me back?

S.FORM: ku sukiyamai anga sun nu tiyaw. ku valitai anga sun nu tiyaw.
ko sokiyamai anga son no tiyaw. ko valitai anga son no tiyaw.
S.TRANSL: I will return it to you tomorrow.

S.FORM: nungida anga su pacikelen a ku ljaqulj?
nongida anga so pacikelen a ko ljaqolj?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to return my book?

S.FORM: ku pinacikel anga tjatiyaw tjanusun ayaken?
ko pinacikel anga tjatiyaw tjanoson ayaken?
S.TRANSL: 我昨天不是已經還你了嗎？
Didn't I return it to you yesterday?

S.FORM: sini pasedjam cu a inepic ni Kasi tjanusun?
sini pasedjam co a inepic ni Kasi tjanoson?
S.TRANSL: Did Kasi lend you this pen?

S.FORM: ui, ku kinisedjam tucu tjaimadju.
oi, ko kinisedjam toco tjaimadjo.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I borrowed it from him today.

S.FORM: su kinisedjam cu a inepic tjai Kasi?
so kinisedjam co a inepic tjai Kasi?
S.TRANSL: Did you borrow this pen from Kasi?

S.FORM: ini, vineli cu ni kina.
ini, vineli co ni kina.
S.TRANSL: No, this is what mom bought.

S.FORM: nekanga nu qatia, sau kisedjamu tjai Balu tua qatia.
nekanga no qatia, sao kisedjamo tjai Balo toa qatia.
S.TRANSL: We are out of salt, let's borrow some from Balu.

S.FORM: ui, vaik a ken a kisedjam.
oi, vaik a ken a kisedjam.
sau sukiyami a ku paisu ayau ti Saunuyaw.
sao sokiyami a ko paiso ayao ti Saonoyaw.
S.TRANSL: Go and ask Sauniyaw to return my money.

S.FORM: pida a kiyam nimadju tjanusun?
pida a kiyam nimadjo tjanoson?
S.TRANSL: How much does she owe you?

S.FORM: mainu sun?
maino son?
vaik a ken a sema puljacengan a temalem tua ljaceng.
vaik a ken a sema poljacengan a temalem toa ljaceng.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to plant vegetables in the garden.

S.FORM: kemudakuda sun ? anema su kudakudain?
kemodakoda son ? anema so kodakodain?
cemecemel anga aravac, ljemivaljivas a ken, sa uri ku djiqesen anan nu sauni.
cemecemel anga aravac, ljemivaljivas a ken, sa ori ko djiqesen anan no saoni.
S.TRANSL: 草太多了，我在砍草，等一下要澆水。
There's too much grass, I'm cutting it, I'll have to water it later.

S.FORM: pai alapan a ken tua tjakit katua kudra ui?
pai alapan a ken toa tjakit katoa kodra oi?
S.TRANSL: 幫我把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來好嗎？
Will you get my scythes and hoes, please?

S.FORM: su pininu?
so pinino?
ku pinipaqadaqada tua kakara.
ko pinipaqadaqada toa kakara.
S.TRANSL: Put it next to the plow rake.

S.FORM: su vinatjukan anga qipu?
so vinatjokan anga qipo?
S.TRANSL: Did you turn over the soil?

S.FORM: tjau ku vatjukan, ki tjukudan nu sauni.
tjao ko vatjokan, ki tjokodan no saoni.
S.TRANSL: 我剛翻過土，等等要播種。
I just turned over the soil, and so on to sow seeds.

S.FORM: makayanga a ki ljacengan a su sinitalem?
makayanga a ki ljacengan a so sinitalem?
S.TRANSL: 你種的菜可以收成了嗎？
Are your vegetables ready to be harvested?

S.FORM: makayanga cu a kiljacengen a kadrupung, azua a samaq inikanan a makaya a kiljacengen.
makayanga co a kiljacengen a kadropong, azoa a samaq inikanan a makaya a kiljacengen.
S.TRANSL: 這裡的高麗菜可以收成了，那裡的山萵苣就還不能收成。
The cabbage here is ready to be harvested, but the Showa grass there is not yet ready to be harvested.

S.FORM: ua! Ljiyaw anga ravac a su kinivurati.
oa! Ljiyaw anga ravac a so kinivorati.
S.TRANSL: 哇！你挖了這麼多的地瓜。
Wow! You dug up so many gourds.

S.FORM: pusaladji a ken a pasa kubaw ui?
posaladji a ken a pasa kobaw oi?
S.TRANSL: Will you help me with the barn?

S.FORM: kemudakuda mun?
kemodakoda mon?
anema nu kudakudain?
anema no kodakodain?
pu amiami amen a kicciqaw.
po amiami amen a kicciqaw.
S.TRANSL: We're releasing fishing nets to catch fish.

S.FORM: liyaw a ciqaw i maza?
liyaw a ciqaw i maza?
liyaw anga a kini ciqaw a pinipidrur.
liyaw anga a kini ciqaw a pinipidror.
S.TRANSL: 魚簍裡已經抓了很多魚。
The fish basket has been full of fish.

S.FORM: kemudakuda sun nu kiciqaw?
kemodakoda son no kiciqaw?
S.TRANSL: How do you usually catch fish?

S.FORM: paka tua vukevuk a ken a kiciqaw.
paka toa vokevok a ken a kiciqaw.
S.TRANSL: I shoot fish with a spear.

S.FORM: saigu sun a penanaq a qemaljup?
saigo son a penanaq a qemaljop?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to hunt with a bow and arrow?

S.FORM: pudringadringai a ken a djemameq tua sacemel, sa izua nu masi kuang a masi vatu a ken uta a qemaljup.
podringadringai a ken a djemameq toa sacemel, sa izoa no masi koang a masi vato a ken ota a qemaljop.
S.TRANSL: 我通常都是用陷阱抓獵物，偶爾也會拿槍帶狗狩獵。
I usually catch my prey with a trap, but occasionally I hunt with a gun and a dog.

S.FORM: pinaka zuazunan cu nua vavui.
pinaka zoazonan co noa vavoi.
S.TRANSL: This is the road the boar took.

S.FORM: pinaka sinan djalan cu nua vavui.
pinaka sinan djalan co noa vavoi.
S.TRANSL: This is the road the boar took.

S.FORM: aku susikeljang?
ako sosikeljang?
pinaka zuanan cu nua vavui, manasika paka zuazunan cu nua vavui
pinaka zoanan co noa vavoi, manasika paka zoazonan co noa vavoi
S.TRANSL: 這是山豬的腳印，所以這是山豬所走的路。
These are the footprints of the boar, so this is the path the boar took.

S.FORM: adri tjaljiljiyaw a tja dringai, matu nadjemameq anga tua sacemel.
adri tjaljiljiyaw a tja dringai, mato nadjemameq anga toa sacemel.
S.TRANSL: 快去看我們的陷阱，好像抓到獵物了。
Go and see our trap, for it seems that we have caught our prey.

S.FORM: aku susi keljang?
ako sosi keljang?
matu semqu anga a vatu. Ari tja kidjadjalanai.
mato semqo anga a vato. Ari tja kidjadjalanai.
S.TRANSL: 狗好像聞到味道了。我們快跟過去。
The dog seems to have smelled it. Let's follow them.

S.FORM: anema cu a su sanayanayain?
anema co a so sanayanayain?
S.TRANSL: 你正在製作的是什麼東西？

S.FORM: aicu mana sinan dringai tua paqezetj ta qacailjai, sidringadringai tua kulavaw.
aico mana sinan dringai toa paqezetj ta qacailjai, sidringadringai toa kolavaw.
S.TRANSL: 這是石壓式陷阱，用來抓老鼠的。
This is a stone trap, used to catch rats.

S.FORM: anema zua su pinizua?
anema zoa so pinizoa?
S.TRANSL: 你放在那裡的是什麼東西？
What is that thing you put there?

S.FORM: azua mana sidringadringai tua paka ta kula a calis, mavan nu niaya sidringadringai tua takec.
azoa mana sidringadringai toa paka ta kola a calis, mavan no niaya sidringadringai toa takec.
S.TRANSL: 那是套腳式繩索陷阱，我們用它來抓山羌。
It was a leg-rigged rope trap, and we used it to catch Shankiang.

S.FORM: maleva itjen tua papuluqem nua tja vuvu, ljiyaw a tja qadaw tucu.
maleva itjen toa papoloqem noa tja vovo, ljiyaw a tja qadaw toco.
S.TRANSL: 感謝祖靈賜福，今天我們有很多獵物收獲。
Thanks to the blessing of our ancestors, we had a great harvest today.

S.FORM: maleva itjen tua papuluqem nua tja vuvu, liyaw a tja kinisacemel.
maleva itjen toa papoloqem noa tja vovo, liyaw a tja kinisacemel.
S.TRANSL: 感謝祖靈賜福，今天我們有很多獵物收獲。

S.FORM: uidri! tja kacuaw a pakaleva a semaqinaljan.
oidri! tja kacoaw a pakaleva a semaqinaljan.
S.TRANSL: 是啊！我們帶回部落好好分享吧！
Yeah! Let's take it back to the tribe and share it!

S.FORM: tucu a qadav uri tuluan itjen ni sinsi tu kemuda qivu tua penayuanan na qemuziquzip.
toco a qadav ori toloan itjen ni sinsi to kemoda qivo toa penayoanan na qemoziqozip.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家動物的排灣語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of animals in Paiwan language today.

S.FORM: tucu a qadav uri tuluan itjen ni sinsi tu kemuda qivu tua penayuanan na cemuvucuvuq.
toco a qadav ori toloan itjen ni sinsi to kemoda qivo toa penayoanan na cemovocovoq.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家植物的排灣語怎麼說。

S.FORM: tucu a qadav uri tuluan itjen ni sinsi tu kemeda qivu tua penayuanan na kudamunu.
toco a qadav ori toloan itjen ni sinsi to kemeda qivo toa penayoanan na kodamono.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家水果的排灣語怎麼說。

S.FORM: namakuda kinaqadavan tuazua qadav?

S.FORM: uri naljemaljaqel, emuba itjen a casav.

namakoda kinaqadavan no polavalavai?

S.FORM: uri namaljenguaq a qadav nu pulavalavay.

a ori qemodjalj toazoa qadav?

It will have no rain and be sunny that day.

S.FORM: a uri qemudjalj tuazua qadav?
a ori qemodjalj toazoa qadav?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: ui, uri qemudjalj tuazua iqadav.
oi, ori qemodjalj toazoa iqadav.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it will be rainy that day.

S.FORM: a qemudjaqudjalj tucu?
a qemodjaqodjalj toco?
nameljay anga, qemadaqadav anga.
nameljay anga, qemadaqadav anga.

S.FORM: a qemudjaqudjalj tucu?
a qemodjaqodjalj toco?

neka no qodjalj toco, no masokincengelj kiqemodjalj, kemaco itjen sakamaya toa kaosoa.

S.FORM: nu icavilj a kaljaljeqelan atu'i uri ljemaljeqel kemuda?

oi, ori ljemaljeqel aravac no icavilj, emitong itjen a pakaliav.

Yes, it will be very cold in winter next year, so you need to put on extra layers.

S.FORM: tucu a cavilj a kaljazulzulan 'atui uri zemulezul?
toco a cavilj a kaljazolzolan 'atoi ori zemolezol?

S.FORM: ui, uri zumelezul aravac, semuqaca itjen a temekel tua zaljum.
oi, ori zomelezol aravac, semoqaca itjen a temekel toa zaljom.

S.FORM: tjengelay sun tua kaljavevean?
tjengelay son toa kaljavevean?

S.FORM: tjengelay sun tua kaljauraman?

inika ken a tjengelay toa kaljaoraman, ro vali a kaljaoraman pai.

S.FORM: inika ken a paqenetj anga kemacu tua laqulj.
inika ken a paqenetj anga kemaco toa laqolj.

S.FORM: isapitjan aken tjanusun a pacun.
isapitjan aken tjanoson a pacon.

S.FORM: inika ken a paqenetj anga a kemacu tua siquliqulip.
inika ken a paqenetj anga a kemaco toa siqoliqolip.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the eraser.

S.FORM: ku pasedjamay sun.
ko pasedjamay son.

inika son a paqenetj anga kemaco toa inpic?

oi, pasedjami aken toa inpic oi?

ori keman aken toa minpao.

nakeman anga ken ta votjolj na koka.
ari vaiki a seman mali.
ari vaiki a seman mali.
vaivai'u, ku kimavanga nusauni.
vaivai'o, ko kimavanga nosaoni.

S.FORM: ari vaiki a emave'av/ljemanguy.
ari vaiki a emave'av/ljemangoy.

oi nangoaq angata! ari kaciyori.
ari vaiki a seman mali.
ari vaiki a seman mali.

sikoda, vaiki anan a semakoc toa laqolj.

S.FORM: namenuremur anga sun?
namenoremor anga son?
inianan, semenasenav anan aken tua 'isi.
inianan, semenasenav anan aken toa 'isi.

S.FORM: namenuremur anga sun?
namenoremor anga son?

namenoremor anga ken.

S.FORM: nasemenav anga sun tua 'isi?

nasenav anga ken toa ko 'isi.

S.FORM: pilima anga ken nusauni.
pilima anga ken nosaoni.

S.FORM: kemudakuda sun tasauni?
kemodakoda son tasaoni?

S.FORM: nakemin aken tjai sinsi.

S.FORM: uri puntalj aken a tjumaq.
ori pontalj aken a tjomaq.

S.TRANSL: What is she doing after school?

S.FORM: uri vaik a iyugi timadju.
ori vaik a iyogi timadjo.

oi i tjomaq aken, saomaqano a 'irimo.
Ljumeg, i tjumaq sun?
Ljomeg, i tjomaq son?

neka ti Ljomeg i tjomaq! ti Vais aken, kemoda aya son? ko qivoav anga ti Ljomeg no mangtjez i tjomaq.

S.FORM: a tima mun?
a tima mon?

vovo, ti Ljomeg kati Vais amen, pai soqeljevi a paljing!
S.TRANSL: 奶奶，我們是Ljumeg和Vais，幫我們開門!
Grandma, we are Ljumeg and Vais, please open the door for us.

S.FORM: tima?
tima?
ti Vais aken, kemikim aken tjai Kuljelje.
ti Vais aken, kemikim aken tjai Koljelje.

S.FORM: vuvu, mangtjez aken a kivala tjanusun.
vovo, mangtjez aken a kivala tjanoson.
S.TRANSL: Grandma, I am here to see you.

S.FORM: sicuayan anga su pinangtjezan, nasengelit anga ken tjanusun.
sicoayan anga so pinangtjezan, nasengelit anga ken tjanoson.

S.FORM: Vais, ari vaiki a kivangavang.
Vais, ari vaiki a kivangavang.
